entity.name: Jared Kushner

text:
Fascinating convo w/@GovChristie who says he's looking at 2024 Presidential Run. To help small businesses he set up @NJ30dayfund. Christie says we lost chance for more competent Trump govt when Bannon & Kushner threw transition plans in dumpster 
@TheHill https://t.co/KR8Y6WZ5pz
